 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּט‎</span>] **verb** ==wrap closely, tightly, enwrap, envelope== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cleave, stick*** to a thing; also transitive ***make to stick***, or ***adhere***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאט‎</span> [[2Sam.19.15|2Sam 19:15]] (so read, for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָאַט‎</span>, [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]); ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוֺט‎</span> [[Isa.25.7|Isa 25:7]] (compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 445</sup>); ***Passive participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּטָה‎</span> [[1Sam.21.10|1Sam 21:10]] — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוּטָה בַשִּׂמְלָה‎</span> [[1Sam.21.10|1Sam 21:10]] it is ***wrapped up in a garment*** (of sword of Goliath); figurative of covering as sign of mourning, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלּוֺט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּנֵיהַֿלּוֺט‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלכָֿלהָֿעַמִּים‎</span> [[Isa.25.7|Isa 25:7]] ***the surface of covering which covereth over all the peoples*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ׅ‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(מַסֵּכָה הַנְּסוּכָה‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect envelope, wrap*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַּיָּ֫לָט פָּנָיוּ בְּאַדַּרְתּוֺ‎</span> [[1Kgs.19.13|1Kgs 19:13]].
